content: row k to end cast off rem 8 9 10 11 12 13 sts cast off rem 8 9 10 11 12 13 sts 5 back repeat last 8 8 8 8 10 10 row 4 5 6 7 8 9 times more 38 42 46 50 54 58 sts using 3 25mm needles cast on 49 55 59 65 69 75 sts cont without shaping until sleeve measures 12 15 17 20 24 29 cm row 1 rs k to end from cast on edge ending with rs facing for next row row 2 ws k to end these 2 row set garter stitch and are repeated shape sleeve top work 2 more row in g-st cast off 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts at beg of next 6 row 8 12 10 14 12 16 sts change to 4mm needles and cont in g-st throughout until back cast off rem 8 12 10 14 12 16 sts measures 11 14 17 18 21 23 cm from cast on edge ending with rs facing for next row neckband place markers at each end of last row to identify armholes cont until back measures 16 19 23 27 28 31 cm from cast on edge join shoulder seams with rs facing and using 3 25mm needles ending with rs facing for next row slip 2 2 2 3 3 4 sts left on holder at right side of neck onto needle work 12 16 16 16 20 20 row more using same needle pick up and k12 14 14 14 18 18 sts evenly up right side of neck 4 sts evenly down right side of back neck k across 13 15 15 17 19 21 sts left on holder at back of neck shape neck pick up and k4 sts evenly up left side of neck 12 14 14 14 18 18 sts next row rs k18 20 22 24 25 27 turn and leave rem evenly down left side of neck and k across 2 2 2 3 3 4 sts left on 31 35 37 41 44 48 sts on needle holder at left side of neck 49 55 55 59 69 73 sts work each side of neck separately knit 4 row next row ws k to end cast off knitwise next row rs k to last 2 sts k2tog neck edge 17 19 21 23 24 26 sts right front border repeat last 2 row once more 16 18 20 22 23 25 sts work 3 row without shaping with rs facing and using 3 25mm needles beg at lower edge of right front pick up and k34 41 50 56 60 66 sts evenly up right front edge to neckband and 3 sts evenly up neckband shape shoulder 37 44 53 59 63 69 sts next row rs cast off 8 9 10 11 11 12 sts k to end knit 3 row 8 9 10 11 12 13 sts buttonhole row 1
